Project Settings¶

Django settings for the Capstone Portfolio project.

The configuration is intentionally structured to support both local development and production-friendly defaults without requiring third-party packages. Sensitive values are fetched from environment variables with safe fallbacks suitable for local work.

Configuration Notes¶

  • DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS — Comma-separated list of permitted hosts.

  • STATIC_ROOT and MEDIA_ROOT — Preconfigured paths for collectstatic and user uploads.

  • LOGGING — Streams structured logs to stdout via the console handler.
